plot: Kristen confides in Margo and tells her that she is determined to fight the other woman in Clarke's life as soon as she finds out who it is. Meanwhile, Stephanie visits Clarke at his loft and pressures him to stop loving her. Clarke refuses and kisses Stephanie. Eric explains to Brooke that he will pay Beth's medical bills. The next visitor at the hospital is Ridge which touches Brooke. They are both surprised when Caroline arrives shortly later to show her love and support to Beth. At the Forrester Mansion, Ridge accepts the shipment with the yearbooks from Northwestern University that his mother has been so anxiously waiting for.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
